section.p: To renounce the worship of Nisoderu, you must pay 40 Shards to the temple by way of compensation.
A passing nun says disdainfully, 'If you are not pure enough to remain an initiate, then the sun will burn you, mark my words.'

Do you want to change your mind?
If you are determined to renounce your faith,
pay the 40 Shards and delete Nisoderu from the God box
on your Adventure Sheet. [If you had a resurrection arranged with Nisoderu, you will lose that as well --Ed]
